field_description: 5-character FIPS code
1-character Ownership code
6-character Industry Code (NAICS, SuperSector)
2-character aggregation level code
1-character size code
4-character year
1-character quarter (always A for annual)
1-character disclosure code (either ' '(blank) or 'N' not disclosed)
Multi-character area title associated with the area's FIPS (Excluded from singlefile)
Multi-character ownership title associated with the ownership code (Excluded from singlefile)
Multi-character industry title associated with the industry code (Excluded from singlefile)
Multi-character aggregation title associated with the agglvl code (Excluded from singlefile)
Multi-character size title associated with the size code (Excluded from singlefile)
Annual average of quarterly establishment counts for a given year
Annual average of monthly employment levels for a given year
Sum of the four quarterly total wage levels for a given year
Sum of the four quarterly total taxable wage totals for a given year
Sum of the four quarterly contribution totals for a given year
Average weekly wage based on the 12-monthly employment levels and total annual wage levels
Average annual pay based on employment and wage levels for a given year
1-character location-quotient disclosure code (either '' (blank) or 'N' not disclosed)
Location quotient of annual average establishment count relative to the U.S. (Rounded to hundredths place)
Location quotient of annual average employment relative to the U.S. (Rounded to hundredths place)
Location quotient of total annual wages relative to the U.S. (Rounded to hundredths place)
Location quotient of taxable annual wages relative to the U.S. (Rounded to hundredths place)
Location quotient of total annual contributions relative to the U.S. (Rounded to hundredths place)
Location quotient of annual average weekly wage relative to the U.S. (Rounded to hundredths place)
Location quotient of annual average pay relative to the U.S. (Rounded to hundredths place)
1-character over-the-year disclosure code (either ' '(blank) or 'N' not disclosed)
Over-the-year change in annual average establishments for a given year
Over-the-year percent change in annual average establishments for a given year (Rounded to the tenths place)
Over-the-year change in annual average employment for a given year
Over-the-year percent change in annual average employment for a given year (Rounded to the tenths place)
Over-the-year change in the total annual wages for a given year
Over-the-year percent change in total annual wages for a given year (Rounded to the tenths place)
Over-the-year change in taxable annual wages for a given year
Over-the-year percent change in taxable annual wages for a given year (Rounded to the tenths place)
Over-the-year change in annual contributions for a given year
Over-the-year percent change in annual contributions for a given year (Rounded to the tenths place)
Over-the-year change in annual average weekly wage for a given year
Over-the-year percent change in annual average weekly wage for a given year (Rounded to the tenths place)
Over-the-year change in average annual pay for a given year
Over-the-year percent change in average annual pay for a given year (Rounded to the tenths place)
